r.s: Common elements for the University of Nebraska-Lincoln
r.d: This package contains commonly used elements for the University of Nebraska-Lincoln: Buildings
r.n:
Major overhaul:
* Building data is no longer bundled with the package * The new DataDriverInterface allows custom data sources * Upgrades no longer required to retrieve campus building data
UNL_Common is now driver-based. The default driver for building data uses a JSON output from the campus tour.
